document_title: What disease causes dizziness when lying down? Causes and treatments
subsection_content:
To diagnose the cause of your dizziness, your doctor may ask you to answer some questions such as:
Are you suffering from neurological, cardiovascular or other diseases?; Does dizziness when lying down occur continuously? How often do you experience dizziness?; Before experiencing dizziness, did you feel tired or have any other symptoms?; Is your dizziness accompanied by any other symptoms?; Your medical history, have you or a family member ever experienced dizziness when lying down?
In addition, depending on the accompanying symptoms or frequency of dizziness, whether the dizziness is severe or not and other manifestations, the doctor may ask the patient to perform blood tests, CT scan or MRI of the brain. …
